name: master-thesis-onboarding
description: Master thesis of onboarding with mobile applications

scripts.compile: npm run compile:forms && npm run compile:thesis
scripts.compile:forms: mkdir -p obj/forms && find forms \( -iname "*.tex" ! -iname "structure.tex" -exec basename {} \; \) | while read file; do latexmk -pdf -outdir=obj -auxdir=obj -jobname="forms/${file%.*}" "forms/$file";done
scripts.clean: npm run clean:thesis && npm run clean:forms && npm run clean:dist
scripts.spellcheck: for f in chapters/*.tex ; do echo $f ; aspell --lang=en --mode=tex --extra-dicts=./project.dic list < $f | sort | uniq -c ; done
scripts.move: npm run move:thesis && npm run move:forms
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run move

author: Simon L. Johansson @simonlovesyou
